section.title: Introduction
section.para: This guide provides instructions for installing &sr;, its third party libraries, the (optional) PETSc library, sample data sets, and &sr; documentation. The PETSc library adds equation solvers to &sr;'s SolveMatrix module (see ).
&sr; is compatible with two platforms: SGI and Linux. lists the recommended system requirements.
describes the minimum software requirements for building &sr;.

On Linux systems (Mandrake 9 and Red Hat 8), &sr; binaries can be installed via an RPM package or from &sr;'s source code distribution. The &sr; RPM distribution does not provide support for PETSc. PETSc support is available only through the &sr; source code distribution.
On SGI systems &sr; must be installed from the source code distribution.
